TopicTitle: Unplayable because there is no option to adjust screen size.

Articles.Content: I spend $40 on this game and it's unplayable. I cant access any buttons on the side of the screen and cant read anything on the top or buttom. And there is no option to adjust the screen size in the settings. How can they miss a feature SO simple? I'm playing on xbox one.

to add extra context to a statement that i made

I was having the exact same issue.  I found a fix as Zoltar70 said above - go into the "Settings" section when at the start up screen.  Then adjust "UI Aspect Ratio" under "General Settings" - I changed mine to 96% as well, and it seems to show all of the controls on my TV screen now.

Hope this helps!
